title: Ignition protection
fullText:
The design and construction of a device such that under design operating conditionsâ€”
(a)	it will not ignite a flammable hydrocarbon mixture surrounding the device when an ignition source causes an internal explosion;
(b)	it is incapable of releasing sufficient electrical or thermal energy to ignite a hydrocarbon mixture; or
(c)	the source of ignition is hermetically sealed.
